welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Puerto Vallarta, where the sun always shines and the charm of the city is as inviting as its beautiful beaches. Get ready to explore our vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural landscapes. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.description: Los Alcatraces Restaurante is a mexican restaurant located in Pto Vallarta.
restaurants.address: Paseo Del Marlin 552 (Col. Fluvial Vallarta), 48312 Pto Vallarta, Jalisco
